Package com.tyndalehouse.step.core.data

Class FieldConfig

java.lang.Object
com.tyndalehouse.step.core.data.FieldConfig
public class FieldConfig extends Object
Records how a field is stored in Lucene

      name - the name of the lucene field
      rawDataField - the names of the matching fields in the data file
      store - the type of store
      index - the type of index
      type - the type of field, if not a string
